mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMENT (COMMENT_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_REGISTER_DATE, COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_ID, PROVIDER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{commentContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{boardId}, #{providerId})
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, U.NAME FROM TBL_COMMENT C JOIN TBL_USERS U ON C.PROVIDER_ID = U.PROVIDER_ID AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId} ORDER BY COMMENT_REGISTER_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_COMMENT SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent}, COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE COMMENT_ID = #{commentId}
